## FieldsetSchema type

Schema structure for defining fieldsets inside AForm

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FieldsetSchema = BaseSchema & {
    label?: string;
    schema?: (FormSchema | TableSchema)[];
    collapsible?: boolean;
};
```
